title: Tommy Hilfiger Men's Big and Tall Button Down Short Sleeve Shirt Oxford
features: Tommy Hilfiger big and tall button down short sleeve shirt for men featuring a rounded pocket at chest.
Classic fit, college oxford trim at button interior.
Tommy Hilfiger flag embroidery at pocket
Collar button hole, tri color label, and box pleats at back.
This tommy Hilfiger big and tall short sleeve button down shirt creates a casual look for any occasion
